name: Crispy Wings
description: 6 wings fried to crispy perfection tossed with your choice of Haus BBQ, Haus Buffalo, or our Haus Spicy Dry rub. Combine BBQ or Buffalo with Spicy Dry Rub and get Rail BBQ or Rail Hot. Served with a side of ranch.

name: German Pretzel Bites
description: Pretzel Bites w/ beer cheese or obatzda cheese for dipping!

name: Hummus Plate
description: hummus, pita bread, cucumbers, olives, red onions, olive oil.

name: Party Board
description: any three sausages, pretzel bites, haus fries, haus sauce, mustard, haus beer cheese sauce

name: Wing Party Board
description: Perfect sampler of 18 wings fried to crispy perfection tossed with your choice of Haus BBQ, Haus Buffalo, or our Haus Spicy Dry rub. Includes Pretzel bites and Haus Fries.

name: Side of Haus Beer Cheese Sauce
